meanings.definition: Lipases: enzymes that break down fats
meanings.sent1: The lipases in our bodies help us digest the yummy fats in our food.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study how lipases work to understand how our bodies process fats.
meanings.sent3: The lipases at the party were the first to finish the plate of greasy snacks.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like the powerful action of lipases breaking down fats.
meanings.sent5: The lipases in the kitchen were like tiny workers diligently breaking down the fats in the dishes.

meanings.definition: Lipases: proteins that aid in the digestion of lipids
meanings.sent1: The lipases in our stomachs help us digest the fats from our meals.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are researching how lipases assist in breaking down lipids during digestion.
meanings.sent3: The lipases in the body were like little helpers ensuring the smooth digestion of fats.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of the subject acted as lipases, aiding in the breakdown of complex ideas.
meanings.sent5: The lipases in the digestive system were like friendly guides, helping the body process lipids efficiently.
